description: Detects the export of the target Registry key to a file.
name: Exports Registry Key To a File
query: ((process.executable:*\\regedit.exe AND process.command_line:(*\ \/E\ * OR *\ \-E\ *)) AND (NOT ((process.command_line:(*hklm* OR *hkey_local_machine*)) AND (process.command_line:(*\\system OR *\\sam OR *\\security)))))
author: Oddvar Moe
Sander Wiebing
oscd.community
